title: ping issues
body:
Usually i get somewhere from 25-35 ms, i usually find it laggy at 40. I hopped into a ranked and i was fine for the first 10 minutes, thankfully i popped off early and we had a lead, ended up winning but i had to play with 100-250ms and it was a really bad experience. 
Someone else posted about this and u said to download winmtr and start it for 104.160.131.1

I did so and these are the results.
here is a screenshot of speedtest.net to chicago (where i believe the servers are) and u can see its 20 ms, and a screenshot of in game and also the winmtr results
http://imgur.com/TPxxDJd
http://imgur.com/0mBx6Ik
http://imgur.com/0akXbHO
Its not on my end from what i can tell
can you please look further into this
My isp is rogers

replies.body: I hit up some of our tech guys about this, and it seems that your modem is pretty notorious for having issues.  :X  Based on what I see here, it's struggling to actually trace out of your network.  If you're pretty tech saavy, checking your modem for firmware updates could help.  Otherwise, your best bet may be to contact your ISP to look into this or even get you a new one.  Good luck!!
im back at a 25-35 ms , thanks
